title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
content: The previous contest is voided because of various reasons. This is a self moderated thread. Please DO NOT reserve a spot. The best policy is to turn the "Notify" on instead of reserving a spot and later forgetting about it...Reward..We will announce 2 winners (entry) and each will receive $100 in BTCDeadline to submit your work is on 15th August UTC 23:50 2023QuoteAt Sinbad.io, we are the most popular Bitcoin mixer. Sinbad allows you to Mix Your BTC Quickly using our premixed Bitcoin. Thus it breaks the link between the transactions before and after the mixing and makes it impossible to track the connection between the bitcoins that came into the mixer and went out. We require a new set of avatar for our current signature campaign. The avatar will need to blend well with our newly branded website and signature set. We welcome you to join the contest and be one of the winner of $200 prize pool. - Sinbad Management..Rules and requirements..ðŸ‘‰ You must need to provide original and creative artworks, if found copied other's works or used templates found available online then you will be disqualified and tagged.ðŸ‘‰ You must need to follow forum requirements for avatar file format and dimension.ðŸ‘‰ The winning entries will need to surrender the source file of the original work.ðŸ‘‰ You can enter in the contest as many times as you want but each entry will need to have minimum three concepts or it will be disqualified.ðŸ‘‰ You can win both prize if we accept maximum two set of your entry which means you have chance to win the entire $200 of the prize pool.ðŸ‘‰ You must need to upload a set of large files of the images on imgur or this type of image hosting service which will allow to see all three concepts on one page. Example: https://imgur.com/a/XVw2aMeðŸ‘‰ I and Sinbad management have the full right to disqualify, deny or cancel any entry...How to submit your entry..Code:Avatar size images of the artwork: [img]https://i.ibb.co/pfvQPPf/sinbad1.png[/img] Â  [img]https://i.ibb.co/pfvQPPf/sinbad1.png[/img] Â  [img]https://i.ibb.co/pfvQPPf/sinbad1.png[/img]URL of the same image files in large size: https://imgur.com/a/XVw2aMeBech32 address: bc1qmxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxv7iAny description that describe your concepts: .onion/en]ðŸ“£This campaign is designed and managed by:General Disclaimer: We would like to make it clear that ðŸ’¹ðŸ“ˆ Bitcointalk Campaign Management ðŸ’ªðŸ”¥ Signature & Bounty, managed by Bitcointalk member Royse777, is an independent entity and is not directly affiliated with any of the crypto startups we advertise. While we strive to promote these startups in the best possible light, our views and opinions expressed in our advertising materials do not necessarily reflect those of the startups themselves. We work with various clients across the crypto industry, and our goal is to provide high-quality advertising services to help them achieve their marketing objectives.Payment Disclaimer: Please always check the escrow wallet (if available). If the escrow wallet does not have enough balance and you think you have risk not to get paid then discontinue from the campaign. We are not liable to pay you anything that is not available on the escrow wallet.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on August 06, 2023, 02:17:49 PMThe previous contest is voided because of various reasons. This is a self moderated thread. Please DO NOT reserve a spot. The best policy is to turn the "Notify" on instead of reserving a spot and later forgetting about it.Royse sir, what about the users who have submitted their avatar creations in the previous contest? Do they need to create new avatars from ground up or they can repost their previous avatar entries in this thread as well? I'm among those users who have submitted their avatar entries, and it would be really helpful to know that what should we do now? Waiting for your kind reply, Thank you!

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: SamReomo on August 06, 2023, 03:06:52 PMQuote from: Royse777 on August 06, 2023, 02:17:49 PMThe previous contest is voided because of various reasons. This is a self moderated thread. Please DO NOT reserve a spot. The best policy is to turn the "Notify" on instead of reserving a spot and later forgetting about it.Royse sir, what about the users who have submitted their avatar creations in the previous contest? Do they need to create new avatars from ground up or they can repost their previous avatar entries in this thread as well? I'm among those users who have submitted their avatar entries, and it would be really helpful to know that what should we do now? Waiting for your kind reply, Thank you!That's same question I intended asking too, because it took us several weeks to come up with the concept we did in the previous contest, and I think we deserve some explanation why it been declared void, and what's the way forward. Thanks, as I anticipate to hear from you Sir..

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: 1. There were not many entries and desired designs to pick a winner2. The designs were reflecting old branding, with the new branding we have no use of them.3. If you think your previous works have a chance to win then feel free to resubmit.I hope the reasons are a bit clear now.

comments.body: Old Brand Try 1  Avatar Size :120 x 80 px  Bech-32 Address: bc1q6pm0afcphvqp594fgna8u63gza37qkrm3wvf0s

comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on August 06, 2023, 06:16:55 PM1. There were not many entries and desired designs to pick a winner2. The designs were reflecting old branding, with the new branding we have no use of them.3. If you think your previous works have a chance to win then feel free to resubmit.I hope the reasons are a bit clear now.Alright. Thanks for the response Sir, because with this few words from you now, it gives us a sense of belonging that our work was indeed appreciated, even though It wasn't up to expectation. So once again, it's nice hearing from you Sir.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Avatar size images of the artwork  URL of the same image files in large size: https://imgur.com/a/CjaQ52yBech32 address: bc1q3gjfthgyddgsmadlzp5e3vwmu3tzuhgr0ev5twAny description that describe your concepts:1st image was inspired by pirate flag from anime one piece jolly roger flags, not the previous posted entry, seriously. This is the first concept i've come up after seeing the new Sinbad website design. Both 1st and 2nd image were pixel arts due to new design of Sinbad website. 2nd image has Bitcoin icon on letter "B" on Sinbad logo knowing this is a bitcoin mixer. And an icon of anon on "Mix Now" button/layout.3rd image is inspired to new modern banner designs and themed based on current signature colors of sinbad.I can provide .psd files if asked, if i win accidentally. Lmao.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Royse777 and Sinbad.io team, how will the best design be chosen? Will it be your choice or will you leave it to the forum members?I can already see several quite good solutions, it would be a pity if they are not used.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on August 15, 2023, 06:10:04 PMRoyse777 and Sinbad.io team, how will the best design be chosen? Will it be your choice or will you leave it to the forum members?I can already see several quite good solutions, it would be a pity if they are not used.If I'm not wrong then team Sinbad will decide that which avatar entry is going to get accepted as the winner of the contest. There will be two accepted entries and they could be from a single user or from multiple users. I'm more than sure that Sinbad team will take all designs into consideration and which ever designs represents their brand in the best way, they will give priority to those designs.
